review: I might have been expecting too much from this little device. I planned on using it mainly for Sling TV but, its so slow and lethargic, I probably should have stuck with the regular Fire TV. Coincidentally, I got the Stick from a Sling+Amazon deal. Both Sling and Plex crash at least once a day while streaming. It does Netflix and Hulu well enough. The remote is cheap and flimsy, I may get the Fire TV remote to replace it. I have to use the included wall wart for power, since my new TV doesn't supply enough juice. Kinda disappointing.
